description: Gets information about a wireless gateway task definition.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of the resource to get.

nested_items.name: AutoCreateTasks
nested_items.description: Whether to automatically create tasks using this task definition for all gateways with the specified current version. If false, the task must me created by calling CreateWirelessGatewayTask.

nested_items.name: UpdateDataSource
nested_items.description: The link to the S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: UpdateDataRole
nested_items.description: The IAM role used to read data from the S3 bucket.

nested_items.name: UpdateSignature
nested_items.description: The signature used to verify the update firmware.

nested_items.name: SigKeyCrc
nested_items.description: The CRC of the signature private key to check.

nested_items.name: CurrentVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the gateways that should receive the update.

nested_items.name: PackageVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the wireless gateway firmware.

nested_items.name: Model
nested_items.description: The model number of the wireless gateway.

nested_items.name: Station
nested_items.description: The basic station version of the wireless gateway.

nested_items.name: UpdateVersion
nested_items.description: The firmware version to update the gateway to.

nested_items.name: PackageVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the wireless gateway firmware.

nested_items.name: Model
nested_items.description: The model number of the wireless gateway.

nested_items.name: Station
nested_items.description: The basic station version of the wireless gateway.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name of the resource.
